channel.title: +Articles on आगमे वैष्णवे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +Articles on आगमे वैष्णवे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Islam opinions
item.description:
chaitanya -

tomā-sabāra śāstra-kartā — seha bhrānta haila nā jāni’ śāstrera marma aiche ājñā dila

There are many mistakes and illusions in your scriptures ( Scriptures of mlecchas ) . Their compilers, not knowing the essence of knowledge, gave orders that were against reason and argument.
